enhanced_by.reason: The clear method resets the state of the FromBuilder, which might be necessary before setting up a new scan operation.
The addAll method can be used to add multiple steps to the FromBuilder, which might be required before setting up a scan operation.
The buildSimplify method can be used to verify the simplified result of the scan operation, ensuring that the scan operation behaves as expected.
The where method can be used to apply a condition after the scan operation, which can be used to verify the results of the scan operation.
